comments.name: Yang
comments.text:
Finally, an mbti well-fitting for characters. To be frank, it's quite disappointing when other stories uses mbti but misrepresent their personalities. Access all areas has an intj lead but his behavior is out of character as an intj. The story is good but their behavior is unpredictable. Under the green light portrays their character so well and I like how the story develops. 

Matt is not a pyscho, he just have trouble processing some emotions since he leans more on a logical side.
